definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: All laptops in our shop are brand new and authentic.
sentences.chinese: 本店所售笔记本电脑均为全新正品行货。

sentences.english: What do you think of the keyboard on this laptop?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得这种笔记本电脑的键盘怎么样？

sentences.english: NIKKY: both, but now I am using the notebook.
sentences.chinese: 我两个都有，但是现在我在用笔记本电脑。

sentences.english: Creative laptop bag made out of 42 recycled floppy disks.
sentences.chinese: 用42张回收软盘做成的创意笔记本电脑包。

sentences.english: Is it easy to type on compared to other laptop keyboards?
sentences.chinese: 相对于其它笔记本电脑的键盘是否容易打字？

sentences.english: Apple lords over the high-end market.
sentences.chinese: 苹果目前在高端笔记本电脑市场一枝独秀。

sentences.english: LL: So, you got a new laptop computer, Li Hua?
sentences.chinese: 李华刚买了一台笔记本电脑。

sentences.english: Is the laptop tying him down, or about to set him free?
sentences.chinese: 这个笔记本电脑是把他往下拽，还是给他带去自由？

sentences.english: Backed-up critical files on both of our laptops.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都备份了自己笔记本电脑里的重要文件。

sentences.english: Smudging and spiral notebooks caused the most problems.
sentences.chinese: 沾污和螺旋笔记本电脑造成了许多问题。
一个非常快的笔记本电脑？

sentences.english: The majority of laptop computers come with removable batteries.
sentences.chinese: 多数笔记本电脑配备的是可更换电池。

sentences.english: I'm trying to fix my laptop.
sentences.chinese: 我正在试着修好我的笔记本电脑。

sentences.english: Clearly a single super-computer would be far faster than a single notebook computer.
sentences.chinese: 单独一台超级计算机会比笔记本电脑当然会快得多。

sentences.english: It tried to launch a laptop but the product never came to market.
sentences.chinese: 它试图推出笔记本电脑，但是产品并没有走向市场。

sentences.english: Your diarist settles down for a long session on the laptop.
sentences.chinese: 我们的记者平静下来，将这段时间用在笔记本电脑上。

definition: tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]

pinyin: bi3 ji4 ben3 ji4 suan4 ji1
